message.text: Attack with your shield in the air.
Change the elemental attribute on your rod. （Ice/Fire/Thunder） Can also be done in the air. <COL ffdc78>LV UP Add the elements of Light and Darkness to the elements you can change to.</COL>
Change the elemental attribute on your rod. （Ice/Fire/Thunder/Light/Darkness） Can also be done in the air.
Block enemy's attack with your shield to charge the gauge with the current element on your rod. Can also be activated in the air.
Affix your shield towards the enemy, increasing the amount the gauge will increase. Can be activated in the air.
Activate the shield as an enemy strikes you to increase the gauge by a lot, also consumes no stamina to block.
Fire a ball of elemental energy at the enemy. The element is the same as the current selected. Consumes 1 bar of charge.
Attract the attention of the enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP Increases the amount of attraction.</COL>
Attract the attention of enemies by a lot. Can be activated in the air.
Consumes 1 bar of charge to give the parties weapons the current selected rod element. Can be activated in the air.
Immediately after blocking, either attack the enemy to increase enmity, or dodge backwards. Will consume 1 bar to increase effects if avaliable.
While clinging to an enemy, attack with the current selected attribute. Will consume 1 bar to enhance the effect if avaliable.
